extendedInfo.description: Loads of Fun! VIP 5 stars Poker.The ultimate experience of the most advanced live poker APP for Texas Holdâem and Omaha Poker.Join in and play with your friends using a private inbox. PLAY IN EITHER PORTRAIT OR LANDSCAPEVIEW. GET STARTED WITH 12,000 FREE CHIPS!!!. New Chips and winning capabilities. If you are a pokeraficionado, this is THE game for you! With our amazing user interface you can use the same usernameand chips in all our games.FEATURES:â¢ Play as a guestâ¢ Log in with your Facebook accountâ¢ Share & Post on your Facebook wallâ¢ Play over 3G or Wireless. (lower data traffic, narrow bandwidth request)â¢ Amazing cross â platform experience: play with your friends from different handsets \ PCs \ tablets.â¢ Easy-to-use user interface: play with one hand (portrait view) or two (landscape view possible!).â¢ Intuitive gameplay: play with pre-defined move.â¢ Real players only; no bots are involved in the game.â¢ Chat abilities (in lobby, during the game).â¢ Find your friends and get them to join you.â¢ Private Inbox - leave messages in your friendâs inbox.â¢ Friendly and informative user profile (can be updated at any time + a personal picture).â¢ Daily lottery.â¢ Shared wallet for all of our online gaming.â¢ Transfer chips to your game friends.â¢ Share our games with a friend by SMS or email.â¢ Search your friends by their nicknames.â¢ Choose your table to play.â¢ Different buy-in tables at your choice.â¢ Different number of players per table at your choice.â¢ Pre-define your moveâ¢ Fast tables, slow tablesâ¢ Sort and choose your tableâ¢ Buy or win virtual Chips.â¢ Get online data about your position in the world.â¢ Challenge the best players in the world - choose from the scores tables.â¢ Online updated in-app tables with scores you can sort for your own needs.Coming up in next versions -â¢ Personal Status (new features to appear in the next version).â¢ Call an offline friend to join and play (new features to appear in the next version.)â¢ Send other room players gifts, food, drinks (new features to appear in the next version.)â¢Private tables (new features to appear in the next version.)----The new social cross-platform live gaming including Live Poker (Texas Hold'em and Omaha Poker),Blackjack, Roulette, Lottery, Bingo, Battle at sea and many others (some of the games will be launched inthe next few weeks).This game is just one of many Casino bundle games we have created. reviews.comment: Nice game. But I don\'t no how to play??

reviews.title: Complete Crap
reviews.comment: Immediate un-install.  Portrait mode only, no landscape...impossible to see cards/chips.  Players are forced to buy chips from outset of game in order to play.  AVOID THIS APP!!!!
reviews.author: Eugene Moore

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Needs to enable landscape/ portrait choice.. cards are too squished to see in forced portrait mode..
reviews.author: Angela Maxwell
